models.title: Your tailor-made adventure
models.description:
Discover a new way of travelling where comfort meets simplicity.
Our mini-caravans give you everything you need for unforgettable experiences.

1.title: Quality
1.description: Our teardrops are built to offer exceptional durability and comfort. Each unit is crafted from high-quality materials, ensuring maximum longevity even in demanding conditions.

2.title: Made in France
2.description: Proud of our artisanal manufacturing, we make it a point of honour to design and build our teardrops in France. By choosing our Made in France products, you support local production while enjoying durable products.

story.title: Welcome to my workshop!
story.text1: In the south of France, I've been designing and building unique mini-caravans for more than two years. My craft approach is close to my heart: from the first sketch to the final adjustments, every detail is handmade and continuously refined to deliver a 100% home-built mini-caravan.
story.text2: If you'd like to discuss a project or see the manufacturing process up close, I'll be delighted to welcome you!

story.title: Everything you need, towed behind your car
story.description:
Choose a Teardrop: the compact, easy-to-tow caravan that offers optimal comfort for your trips.

With its sleek design, minimal maintenance and no mechanical costs, you can enjoy every adventure with total peace of mind.
Your cosy cocoon follows you everywhere, ready to go at any time.

story.title: A new way to travel by bike
story.description:
Whether for a short getaway or a long journey, our bike camper goes with you everywhere.
Easy to tow and designed for quick, hassle-free setup, it provides reliable, comfortable shelter at every stop.

Focus on what matters: pedal freely and live the adventure close to nature.

history.title: A project close to our hearts
history.description: After revolutionising car travel with our Teardrops, we launched the bike camper in spring 2025 to bring the same freedom to cycle-tourists. After several prototypes and field tests, we designed a light, robust and ergonomic mini-caravan suited to long distances.
history.mission: Make cycle touring more accessible and comfortable than ever, without compromising on simplicity and the joy of travel.

1.title: Freedom
1.description: Ready in a flash: hitch it up and go, no assembly or bed to make.

2.title: Comfort
2.description: A real bed, optimised space and protection from the elements.

3.title: Safety
3.description: With the lockable door, you and your belongings stay safe.

4.title: Lightness
4.description: Easy to tow, even with a non-electric bike.

5.title: Autonomy
5.description: A design made for long-distance travel and roaming.

faq.otherQuestions: If you have any other questions, feel free to contact us, we'll be happy to help!

teardrop.question1: Do I need a special licence to tow a Teardrop?
teardrop.answer1: No additional licence is required to tow a Teardrop with a GVWR between 500 and 750 kg. However, make sure the combined GVWR of the caravan and towing vehicle does not exceed 3,500 kg, otherwise a specific B96 training will be required.
teardrop.question2: Can the Teardrop be towed by any vehicle?
teardrop.answer2: Thanks to its low weight, the Teardrop can be towed by most cars. To be sure, refer to your vehicle manufacturer's data or check your registration certificate: subtract line F2 from line F3; the result must be greater than or equal to 500 kg.
teardrop.answer3: Yes, our caravans are guaranteed for 2 years. We also offer personalised support for any repairs, modifications or technical questions after purchase.
teardrop.answer4: Of course! We'll be happy to welcome you. Book an appointment via our contact form to organise your visit.
teardrop.question5: What is the manufacturing lead time?
teardrop.answer5: The average lead time is two months, but it may be longer depending on current orders.
teardrop.question6: Are the mini-caravans suitable for all seasons?
teardrop.answer6: The Teardrop is designed to offer optimum comfort in all seasons. Although its outdoor kitchen is more pleasant to use in fine weather, its insulation guarantees comfortable nights.
teardrop.question7: Is it possible to try a teardrop before buying?
teardrop.answer7: Yes, we offer visits and test drives at our workshop in Montpellier. Contact us to arrange an appointment!

bike-camper.question1: Does the bike camper fit all bikes?
bike-camper.answer1: Most of the time, yes. If your bike has specific features, we can design a custom hitch. Don't hesitate to contact us.
bike-camper.answer2: Yes, delivery is possible. Contact us to find out the terms according to your location.
bike-camper.question3: Where can I sleep with it?
bike-camper.answer3: The camper can be used wherever bivouacking is allowed. Check local regulations: in general, you can set up in nature for one night as long as you respect the environment.
bike-camper.answer4: Yes, all our campers are guaranteed for 2 years. We also provide follow-up if needed.
bike-camper.question5: What is the manufacturing lead time?
bike-camper.answer5: The timeframe varies depending on the season and the level of customisation desired. Generally count between 2 and 6 weeks. Contact us for a more precise estimate.
bike-camper.question6: Is it possible to use this camper with a non-electric bike?
bike-camper.answer6: Yes, it is designed to be towed by a standard bike. However, for long distances or hilly terrain, an electric bike can improve comfort.
bike-camper.question7: Are bike campers suitable for all seasons?
bike-camper.answer7: In winter they provide effective protection from the cold, but in extreme temperatures appropriate equipment (sleeping bag, duvet) may be necessary for optimal comfort. In summer, the openings allow good air circulation to keep you cool.
